Commentary.ab: yaϑā. ahū. vairiiō.] 15, 60, 82, 100, 110, 235. Number of Ahuna Vairiiias variable depending on the šnūman, see Ritual Information

Nerangs.ab: NērY0.1 Var c (Nērang ī Nō-nāwar yaštan)

ka ādurgāh kāmēd šustan naxost dast pad pādyāb bē kunišn u-š ātaxš ud barsom bē nigerišn u-š az nōg dast pad pādyāb abāz kunišn u-š xšnaoθra. ahurahe. mazdā̊. tarōidite. tā fərašaōtəməm bē gōwišn u-š az nōg dast pad pādyāb abāz kunišn ud ašemwohū sē ...

ab.em: rōz ī dudīgar ka yašt ī srōš kunēd pēš az ādurgāh suštan yatāhūwairyō panǰ bē gōwišn u-š ādurgāh šustan ...

Nerangs.ab: rōz ī sidīgar pēš az ādurgāh šustan yaθā. ahū. vairiiō. dō ...

When he wants to clean the ādurgāh, first, he has to made his hands clean with pādyāb and to look at the fire and the barsom. He has to made anew his hands clean. He has to recite xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ tarōidite until fərašaōtəməm. He has to made anew his hands clean with pādyāb. (He has to continue with) three Ašemwohū. ... The second day, when he performs the Yašt for Srōš, before cleaning the ādurgāh, he has to recite five Yatāhuwairyō. He should clean the ādurgāh. ... The third day, before cleaning the ādurgāh, (he should recite) two yaθā ahū vairiiō.

When he wants to clean the ādurgāh, first, he has to made his hands clean with pādyāb. He has to recite xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ taraōi.dīti. until staōmi aṣ̌əm. He has to made anew his hands clean with pādyāb. (He has to continue with) three Ašemwohū. ... The second day, when he performs the Yašt for Srōš, before cleaning the ādurgāh, he has to recite five Yatāhuwairyō. He should clean the ādurgāh. ... The third day, before cleaning the ādurgāh, (he should recite) two yaθā ahū vairiiō .

"yaθā ahū vairiiō. If it is a yašt for ašōān, eight times. If it is a yašt for Srōš, five times. If it is the yašt for the patron of the day, seven times. If it is a yašt Nōnāwar, seven times. If it is a yašt Siruze, two times. If it is a yašt for Rapihbin, twelve times. If it is a yašt for Vahman, seven times. (He should recite:) xšnōϑra. ahurahe. mazdā̊. aṣ̌əm. vohī."

ab.ab: "... and if the Yasna of the day Ahuramajd is to be performed, then he recites 10 Ahuna Vairiia, if the Yasna of Ardafrauuaš or of the Gāthā is to be performed, then 8 (Ahuna Vairiia), if the Yasna to Sraoša is to be performed, then 5 (Ahuna Vairiia), if the Yasna to Sīroza is to be performed, then 2 (Ahuna Vairiia), if the Yasna to the Gāhānbār is to be performed, then 4 (Ahuna Vairiia), and if the Yasna of Mīno Nāwar or any of the days is to be performed, then 7 (Ahuna Vairiia).
Then, the chief priest taking the jug which has been made pure, in his right hand, xšnaoϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ 1x Aṣ̌əm Vohū
While reciting, he makes his left hand pure and inserting that hand, which has been made pure, into the jug, he holds the jug. Then the second time xšnaoϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ 1x Aṣ̌əm Vohū
While reciting, he makes his right hand pure."
